metadata.description: Microsoft Foundry project endpoint (recommended) or legacy Azure OpenAI endpoint. Examples: https://my-project.eastus.api.azureml.ms/ or https://my-openai.openai.azure.com/
Embedding model deployment name in your Microsoft Foundry project or Azure OpenAI. Common values: text-embedding-3-small, text-embedding-3-large, text-embedding-ada-002
Embedding dimensions (optional). Example: 1536 for text-embedding-ada-002, 3072 for text-embedding-3-large. Leave empty of  0 for text-embedding-ada-002
Optional: Microsoft Foundry project resource ID for assigning Entra App role. Format: /subscriptions/{sub}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/{project}
